Schumacherjeva žena prekinila molk: Vem, komu vse dolgujem
Družina skriva podrobnosti o zdravstvenem stanju sedemkratnega prvaka formule ena.
07 Nov 2019, 18:45 by T. V.
Žena sedemkratnega svetovnega prvaka Michaela Schumacherja in njegova hči sta dali prvi skupni intervju, odkar je Nemec pred skoraj šestimi leti doživel hudo nesrečo med smučanjem v francoskih Alpah. Corinna (50) in Gina (22) Schumacher sta v pogovoru za nemško revijo Gala razkrili nekaj podrobnosti iz svojega zasebnega življenja. Govorili sta predvsem o ljubezni do konjev in konjeništva, ki ju povezuje, beseda pa je nanesla tudi na njunega slavnega moža oziroma očeta. »Nikoli ne pozabim, komu dolgujem vse to. In to je moj mož Michael,« je povedala Corinna. Dodala pa: »Sanjarila sem, da bi imela svojega konja. Michael je odletel z mano v Dubaj, da bi si ogledala arabske konje.« Spomnila se je, kako se je na prvi pogled zaljubila v enega izmed njih in da je Michael ocenil, da bo njuna hči še boljša od mame, kar se tiče konjeništva. Michael je svoji ženi na posestvu v Švici ob 10. obletnici poroke uredil hlev, Gina pa se profesionalno ukvarja z jahanjem. O zdravstvenem stanju Schumija – 13. novembra bo minilo 25 let odkar je osvojil svojega prvega izmed sedmih naslovov prvaka formule ena – njegova žena in hči nista spregovorili, zato je to še vedno zavito v tančico skrivnosti. Corinna je januarja, ko je Michael dopolnil 50 let, povedala le, da je njen mož v dobrih rokah.

Schumacher's wife broke the silence: I know who I owe everything to
The family is hiding details about the health of a seven-time Formula One champion.
07 Nov 2019, 18:45 by T.V.
The wife of seven-time world champion Michael Schumacher and his daughter gave their first joint interview since a German skiing accident in the French Alps almost six years ago. Corinna, 50, and Gina, 22, Schumacher revealed some details from their personal lives when interviewed for German magazine Gala. They spoke primarily of the love of horses and the horsemanship that binds them together, and the word also applied to their famous husband or father. “I never forget who I owe it to. And this is my husband Michael, "Corinna said. She added, “I dreamed of having my own horse. Michael flew with me to Dubai to see Arabian horses. "She remembered how she had fallen in love with one of them at first glance and that Michael had estimated that their daughter would be even better than her mother in terms of horsemanship. . Michael arranged a stable for his wife on a property in Switzerland on the 10th wedding anniversary, and Gina is a professional horseback riding professional. Schumi's state of health - November 25 will be 25 years since he won his first of seven Formula One champion titles - his wife and daughter have not spoken, so this is still a veil of mystery. Corinna said in January, when Michael turned 50, that her husband was in good hands.
